name: Episode 666
description:
Delve into a spine-chilling episode of a popular ghost hunting YouTube channel, where you will accompany the fearless YouTube Ghost Hunting sensation, Scott Warren. Scott is excited that after years of building his YouTube following, he has finally hit Episode 666!

To celebrate, Scott heads into the sinister depths of Cificap High, a place shrouded in darkness, for what promises to be his most bone-chilling and petrifying episode to date.

Do you have what it takes to accompany Scott through Episode 666? Face your deepest fears and embark on this pulse-pounding quest into the unknown, but be warned, once you enter Cificap High, there's no turning back...

👻🎥📸👻🎥📸👻🎥📸👻🎥📸👻🎥📸👻🎥📸👻

This project was created in a one week break taken by 'Wreck Tangle Games' while they are developing their full featured game 'Quintus and the Formidable Curse'.

If you enjoyed 'Episode 666' we ask that you support the developers by Wishlisting 'Quintus and the Formidable Curse'

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2440100/Quintus_and_the_Formidable_Curse/
